entry.def: Someone who is near-sighted cannot see distant things clearly.

example.ex: The girl squinted at the photograph. She seemed to be nearsighted.
example.tran: 女孩眯起眼睛看照片。她好像近视。

means.word_mean: 1. unable to see distant objects clearly
